name: Mrs. P's Grand Day Out
description:
🫐Mrs. P is a berry farming Opposum who's dropped her jars of jam! Recover them and bring them back home to the barn 🫐

Controls
W A S D for movement
R to restart the game
ESC to exit fullscreen mode

Info
This is a project between myself and Beastiary, who made the models, art, and animations!

More Info
🌐The repository for this project is on GitHub!
🎵Music from the Public Domain: Mushrooms by Komiko
